description: This file contains the implementation of a singly linked list data structure, including methods for adding, removing elements, retrieving size, and accessing elements by index.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A class implementing a singly linked list with basic operations such as add, remove, size, and get.

classes.name: Node
classes.description: A private nested class representing a node in the linked list, holding data and a reference to the next node.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new element to the end of the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of the specified element from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index, throws an exception if the index is out of range.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Privately unlinks a node from the list, used internally by remove method.

methods.name: tail
methods.description: Returns the last node in the list, used internally.
